recipe.title: Omelette In A Jar Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; plain greek yogurt ; (140 g)
½ cup ; fresh spinach, chopped ; (20 g)

steps.step: Prepare each mason jar with oil or nonstick spray of choice to prevent sticking.
In a medium mixing bowl, add all ingredients. Mix well.
Add the egg mixture to the jars, filling them ¾ of the way full. Do not add the lids.
Place the mason jars on a small baking sheet and bake 25-30 minutes.
Remove jars from the oven, then cool 5-10 minutes before serving.

Add the egg mixture to the jars, filling them ¾ of the way full.
Place the mason jars on a small baking sheet and bake 25-30 minutes.
